messages.en: level 20(pre)

messages.zh: 芙兰卡，雷蛇，注意警戒四周。
messages.en: Franka, Liskarm, stay on guard.
I’ll take Misha to officer Ch’en.

messages.zh: 你们又迟到了。别给龙门增加多余的安全隐患。
messages.en: You’re late again. Don't add to Lungmen’s safety hazards.

messages.zh: 陈长官，整合运动多次袭击我们的护送队，现在，敌人仍在我们周围徘徊。
messages.en: Officer Ch’en, Reunion Movement attacked our escort team multiple times. Right now, the enemies are still around us.

messages.zh: 这里并不安全，请赶快带米莎离开。
messages.en: This place isn’t safe, please take Misha away as soon as possible.
You’re Misha?
……Yes.

messages.zh: 从现在起，你必须听从近卫局的安排。
messages.en: From now on, you must abide by the Guard Bureau’s arrangements.
Keep an eye on this child.
Come with me.
Amiya……
It's okay.

messages.zh: 陈长官，这个孩子，我不知道龙门究竟需要她做什么——
messages.en: Officer Ch’en, this child, I don’t know what Lungmen needs her for——

messages.zh: 但我希望龙门能保护好她的安全。
messages.en: But I hope Lungmen can keep her safe.

messages.zh: 龙门对感染者已经很宽厚了。
messages.en: Lungmen is generous enough to the Infected already.
……I know.

messages.zh: 但米莎的身体状况并不好。
messages.en: But Misha’s conditions aren’t good at all.

messages.zh: 我希望龙门在解决事件后，能让米莎在罗德岛生活。
messages.en: I hope that after Lungmen solves this incident, Misha can be allowed to live at Rhodes Island.
——I’ll apply to executive Wei.

messages.zh: 检查后如果没有其他问题，龙门就会把她移交给罗德岛。
messages.en: If there are no other problems after inspection, Lungmen will transfer her to Rhodes Island.
It won’t take long.
Understood.
……Let’s part ways here for now, Misha.
Rhodes Island welcomes you.
……Yes!

messages.zh: 我们的任务就这样结束了？
messages.en: Our mission ends like this?

messages.zh: 牵扯的事情越多，罗德岛越会陷入被动。
messages.en: The more we’re involved in this, the more passive Rhodes Island will be.

messages.zh: 但龙门还把我们蒙在鼓里呢。
messages.en: But Lungmen is still keeping us in the dark.
Lungmen is cold to us——

messages.zh: 但整合运动可是十分热情。
messages.en: But Reunion Movement is very enthusiastic.
Amiya.
Reunion Movement again……!
——They chased all the way to here!

messages.zh: 他们究竟要米莎......做什么？
messages.en: What do they really want Misha……for?
